id=\"bodycol\">\n<div class=\"app\">\n<div align=\"center\">\n<h1>Christopher Kruegel</h1>\n</div>\n<div class=\"h3\"> \n   \n   \n    \n<div class=\"h3\">\n<h3>\n        Biography\n      </h3>\n<hr width=\"80%\" color=\"#A0A0A0\" align=\"left\" size=\"1\">\n</div>\n      \n      \n<p>\n      I am a Professor in the \n      <a href=\"http://www.cs.ucsb.edu/\">Computer Science Department</a>\n      at the University of California, Santa Barbara. I\n      am also involved in the \n      <a href=\"http://www.iseclab.org/\">International Secure\n      Systems Lab</a>. I am one of the co-founders\n      of <a href=\"http://www.lastline.com\">Lastline, Inc.</a>,\n      where I currently serve as the Chief Scientist. Lastline develops\n      innovative solutions to detect and mitigate advanced malware\n      (APTs) and targeted threats.\n      </p>\n      \n<p>\n      My research interests include most aspects of computer\n      security, with an emphasis on malware analysis, web security, \n      network security, and vulnerability analysis.\n      </p>  \n    \n    \n<div class=\"h3\">\n<h3>\n
